page.title: 06A DAY IN MY LIFE, contd.
page.content: That happens every morning and when we are all ready my brother Christian always needs the 'loo'. At 8.30 we sprint to the bus and go to school. When we get there, Lucy and Joanne check the reading records and Mrs. Brown takes the register. Then we give our dinner money to Mrs.Ganderton. After this, we have assembly; we sing some hymns and after a story we go back to the classroom. In the morning we do Peak Maths. Our morning break is at 10.30; we play things like knife, fork, spoon, spear and horses. After play we watch our television programme which is Zig Zag. At 12.00 we have lunch; I am a server, as are all the fourth years. After lunch we go out to play. When we come in, we work until 2.40, when Mrs.Aldridge arrives to teach us poetry and drama.
